00033 @implementation NSString (GHUtils)
00034 
00035 - (NSString *)gh_strip {
00036   return [self stringByTrimmingCharactersInSet:[NSCharacterSet whitespaceAndNewlineCharacterSet]];
00037 }
00038 
00039 - (NSString *)gh_rightStrip {
00040   return [self gtm_stringByReplacingMatchesOfPattern:@"[ \t]+$" withReplacement:@""];
00041 }
00042 
00043 - (NSString *)gh_leftStrip {
00044   return [self gtm_stringByReplacingMatchesOfPattern:@"^[ \t]+" withReplacement:@""];
00045 }
00046 
00047 - (BOOL)gh_isBlank {
00048   return ([@"" isEqualToString:[self gh_strip]]);
00049 }
00050 
00051 + (BOOL)gh_isBlank:(NSString *)s {
00052   if (!s) return YES;
00053   return [s gh_isBlank];
00054 }

00056 #ifndef TARGET_OS_IPHONE
00057 static NSDictionary *gh_gTruncateMiddle = nil;
00058 
00063 - (NSAttributedString *)gh_truncateMiddle {
00064   if (!gh_gTruncateMiddle) {
00065     NSMutableParagraphStyle *style = [[NSParagraphStyle defaultParagraphStyle] mutableCopy];
00066     [style setLineBreakMode:NSLineBreakByTruncatingMiddle];
00067     gh_gTruncateMiddle = [[NSDictionary alloc] initWithObjectsAndKeys:style, NSParagraphStyleAttributeName, nil];
00068     [style release];
00069   }
00070  
00071   return [[[NSAttributedString alloc] initWithString:self attributes:gh_gTruncateMiddle] autorelease];
00072 }

00079 - (NSString *)gh_mimeTypeForExtension {
00080   // TODO(gabe): Doesn't look like css extension gets the mime type?
00081   CFStringRef uti = UTTypeCreatePreferredIdentifierForTag(kUTTagClassFilenameExtension, (CFStringRef)self, NULL);    
00082   NSString *mime = (NSString *)UTTypeCopyPreferredTagWithClass(uti, kUTTagClassMIMEType);
00083   CFRelease(uti);
00084   return [mime autorelease];
00085 }
00086 #endif

00095 - (BOOL)gh_contains:(NSString *)contains options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options {
00096   NSRange range = [self rangeOfString:contains options:options];
00097   return (range.location != NSNotFound);
00098 }
00099 
00110 - (NSString *)gh_lastSplitWithString:(NSString *)s options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options {
00111   NSRange range = [self rangeOfString:s options:options];
00112   if (range.location != NSNotFound) {
00113     return [self substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(range.location + [s length], [self length] - range.location - [s length])];
00114   }
00115   return self;
00116 }

00118 - (NSArray *)gh_cutWithString:(NSString *)cutWith options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options {
00119   return [self gh_cutWithString:cutWith options:options cutAfter:YES];
00120 }
00121 
00122 - (NSArray *)_gh_cutWithString:(NSString *)cutWith characterSet:(NSCharacterSet *)characterSet options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options cutAfter:(BOOL)cutAfter {  
00123   NSMutableArray *words = [NSMutableArray array];
00124   NSScanner *scanner = [[NSScanner alloc] initWithString:self];
00125   scanner.charactersToBeSkipped = nil;
00126   NSString *prependCuts = nil;
00127   while(!scanner.isAtEnd) {
00128     NSString *s = nil;
00129     NSString *cuts = nil;
00130     if (characterSet) {
00131       [scanner scanUpToCharactersFromSet:characterSet intoString:&s];
00132       [scanner scanCharactersFromSet:characterSet intoString:&cuts];
00133     } else if (cutWith) {
00134       [scanner scanUpToString:cutWith intoString:&s];
00135       [scanner scanString:cutWith intoString:&cuts];
00136     }
00137     //NSLog(@"s=%@, cuts=%@", s, cuts);
00138     if (s) {
00139       if (prependCuts) {
00140         s = [prependCuts stringByAppendingString:s];
00141         prependCuts = nil;
00142       }
00143       
00144       if (cutAfter && cuts) {
00145         s = [s stringByAppendingString:cuts];
00146       } else if (!cutAfter && cuts) {
00147         prependCuts = cuts;
00148       }
00149       [words addObject:s];
00150     } else if (cuts) {
00151       [words addObject:cuts];
00152     }
00153   }
00154   if (prependCuts) [words addObject:prependCuts];
00155   
00156   if ([words count] == 0 && [self length] > 0) [words addObject:self];
00157   if ([words count] == 0) [words addObject:@""];
00158   [scanner release];
00159   return words;
00160 }
00161 
00162 - (NSArray *)gh_cutWithString:(NSString *)cutWith options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options cutAfter:(BOOL)cutAfter {
00163   return [self _gh_cutWithString:cutWith characterSet:nil options:options cutAfter:cutAfter];
00164 }
00165 
00166 - (NSArray *)gh_cutWithCharacterFromSet:(NSCharacterSet *)characterSet options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options cutAfter:(BOOL)cutAfter {
00167   return [self _gh_cutWithString:nil characterSet:characterSet options:options cutAfter:cutAfter];
00168 }

00176 - (BOOL)gh_containsCharacters:(NSString *)characters {
00177   return [self gh_containsAny:[NSCharacterSet characterSetWithCharactersInString:characters]];
00178 }
00179 
00185 - (BOOL)gh_containsAny:(NSCharacterSet *)charSet {
00186   NSRange range = [self rangeOfCharacterFromSet:charSet];
00187   return (range.location != NSNotFound);
00188 }
00189 
00196 - (BOOL)gh_only:(NSCharacterSet *)charSet {
00197   return ![self gh_containsAny:[charSet invertedSet]];
00198 }
00199 
00205 - (BOOL)gh_startsWithAny:(NSCharacterSet *)charSet {
00206   NSString *firstChar = [self substringToIndex:1];
00207   return [firstChar gh_containsAny:charSet];
00208 }

00216 - (BOOL)gh_startsWith:(NSString *)startsWith {
00217   return [self gh_startsWith:startsWith options:0];
00218 }
00219 
00227 - (BOOL)gh_startsWith:(NSString *)startsWith options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options {
00228   if ([self length] < [startsWith length]) return NO;
00229   NSString *beginning = [self substringToIndex:[startsWith length]];
00230   return ([beginning compare:startsWith options:options] == NSOrderedSame);  
00231 }
00232 
00239 - (BOOL)gh_endsWith:(NSString *)endsWith options:(NSStringCompareOptions)options {
00240   if ([self length] < [endsWith length]) return NO;
00241   NSString *lastString = [self substringFromIndex:[self length] - 1];
00242   return ([lastString compare:endsWith options:options] == NSOrderedSame);
00243 }
00244 
00250 - (NSString *)gh_attributize {
00251   NSString *end = [self substringFromIndex:1];
00252   NSString *start = [[self substringToIndex:1] lowercaseString];
00253   return [start stringByAppendingString:end];
00254 }
00255 
00264 - (NSString *)gh_fullPathExtension {
00265   NSString *extension = [self pathExtension];
00266   if (![extension isEqualToString:@""]) extension = [NSString stringWithFormat:@".%@", extension];
00267   return extension;
00268 }

00274 + (NSString *)gh_uuid {
00275   CFUUIDRef uuidRef = CFUUIDCreate(nil);
00276   
00277   NSString *uuid = (NSString *)CFUUIDCreateString(nil, uuidRef);
00278   CFRelease(uuidRef);
00279   
00280   return [uuid autorelease];
00281 }
00282 
00287 + (NSMutableCharacterSet *)gh_characterSetsUnion:(NSArray *)characterSets {
00288   NSMutableCharacterSet *charSet = [NSMutableCharacterSet characterSetWithCharactersInString:@""];
00289   for(NSCharacterSet *set in characterSets)
00290     [charSet formUnionWithCharacterSet:set];
00291   
00292   return charSet;
00293 }
00294 
00295 - (NSArray *)gh_substringSegmentsWithinStart:(NSString *)start end:(NSString *)end {
00296   NSMutableArray *segments = [NSMutableArray array];
00297   BOOL within = NO;
00298 
00299   NSScanner *scanner = [NSScanner scannerWithString:self];
00300   [scanner setCharactersToBeSkipped:nil];
00301 
00302   // If we start with start token, the scanner ignores it... 
00303   if ([self gh_startsWith:start]) {
00304     [scanner scanString:start intoString:nil];
00305     within = YES;
00306   }
00307   
00308   NSString *scanned = nil;
00309   
00310   while([scanner scanUpToString:(within ? end : start) intoString:&scanned]) {
00311     if (scanned && [scanned length] > 0)
00312       [segments addObject:[GHNSStringSegment string:scanned isMatch:within]];
00313     
00314     [scanner scanString:(within ? end : start) intoString:&scanned]; // Eat start or end token
00315     scanned = nil;
00316     within = !within;
00317   }
00318   NSUInteger length = [self length] - [scanner scanLocation];
00319   if (length > 0)
00320     [segments addObject:[GHNSStringSegment string:[self substringWithRange:NSMakeRange([scanner scanLocation], length)] isMatch:NO]];
00321   return segments;
00322 }

00326 @implementation GHNSStringSegment
00327 
00328 @synthesize string=string_, match=isMatch_;
00329 
00330 - (id)initWithString:(NSString *)string isMatch:(BOOL)isMatch {
00331   if ((self = [super init])) {
00332     string_ = [string retain];
00333     isMatch_ = isMatch;
00334   }
00335   return self;  
00336 }
00337 
00338 + (GHNSStringSegment *)string:(NSString *)string isMatch:(BOOL)isMatch {
00339   return [[[self alloc] initWithString:string isMatch:isMatch] autorelease];
00340 }
00341 
00342 - (BOOL)isEqual:(id)obj {
00343   return ([[obj string] isEqual:string_] && [obj isMatch] == isMatch_);
00344 }
00345 
00346 - (NSString *)description {
00347   return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"string=%@, isMatch=%d", string_, isMatch_];
00348 }
00349 
00350 - (void)dealloc {
00351   [string_ release];
00352   [super dealloc];
00353 }
